item.title: She Works Hard for the Money
item.description: [[songs/s/seether/karma__effect/remedy.md#hold-your-eyes-closed-take-me-in-vyl-wnanory|She works hard for the money.]] [[songs/s/seether/karma__effect/remedy.md#hold-your-eyes-closed-take-me-in-vyl-wnanory|So hard for it, honey.]] [[songs/s/seether/karma__effect/remedy.md#hold-your-eyes-closed-take-me-in-vyl-wnanory|She works hard for the money,]] [[songs/s/seether/karma__effect/remedy.md#hold-your-eyes-closed-take-me-in-vyl-wnanory|So you better treat her right.
